name: CASE_RATE_CVG
description: This table contains information on the coverages related to the patient(s) involved in the case rate.

columns.name: CASE_RATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case rate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The coverage IDs for the patient(s) involved in the case rate procedures.
